file = parse("schependom.ifc")
surfaces = create_geometry(file)
voxels_a = voxelize(surfaces, VOXELSIZE=0.08)
voxels_b = voxelize(surfaces, VOXELSIZE=0.01)
offset_a = offset(voxels_a)
outmost_a = outmost(offset_a)
offset_a0 = offset(outmost_a)
offset_a1 = outmost(offset_a0)
outer_a = subtract(offset_a0, offset_a1)
offset_b = offset(voxels_b)
outmost_b = outmost(offset_b)
offset_b0 = offset(outmost_b)
offset_b1 = outmost(offset_b0)
outer_b_hr = subtract(offset_b0, offset_b1)
outer_b = resample(outer_b_hr, -8)
internal_a = volume2(outer_a)
internal_b = volume2(outer_b)
volume_a = union(outer_a, internal_a)
volume_b = union(outer_b, internal_b)
a_minus_b = subtract(volume_a, volume_b)
print_components(a_minus_b)
